App Configuration Documentation
[RTC_Timer_RTC001 App]

App Documentation


The diagram shows the RTC Configuration for the App.


The table depicts the UI used for RTC configuration.

Name URI Description
RTC Enable RTC001_erwEnableRTC Enables the RTC module. This needs to be enabled for the working of RTC module.
Enable time initialization once RTC001_erwTimeInitialisation User Configured Time value will be initialized only once even after system reset.
Enable periodic seconds interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicSecInter Enable periodic seconds interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
Enable periodic minutes interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicMinInter Enable periodic minutes interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
Enable periodic hours interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicHrsInter Enable periodic hours interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
Enable periodic days interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicDaysInter Enable periodic days interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
Enable periodic months interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicMonths Enable periodic months interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
Enable periodic years interrupt RTC001_erwPeriodicYears Enable periodic years interrupt. The callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.
User configured calender date value RTC001_srwDateValue The date can be configured by the user through this field. The value should be configured as mm/dd/yyyy.
User configured time value RTC001_srwTimeValue The time can be configured by the user through this field. The value should be configured as hh:mm:ss
User defined interrupt handler for Periodic interrupts RTC001_srwTimerUserFunction The user defined periodic interrupt handler function. The function should be defined by the user with the following prototype : void Func(uint32_t CbArg).
This callback function will be called when the Periodic Timer Event occurs.


The diagram shows the Alarm Configuration for the App.


The table depicts the UI used for alarm configuration.

Name URI Description
Enable timer alarm RTC001_erwTimerAlarm The selection of this UI enables the alarm of RTC module. The user must enable the alarm interrupt and define the alarm handler for proper alarm functionality.
Enable alarm interrupt RTC001_erwAlarmIntrptEna Enables the alarm interrupt. This is valid only if the timer alarm is enabled.
Enable seconds comparison RTC001_erwEnaSecComp Compares the seconds value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches and if the minute,hour,day,month and Year value too match then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
Enable minutes comparison RTC001_erwEnaMinComp Compares the minutes value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches and if the hour,day,month and Year value too match then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
Enable hours comparison RTC001_erwEnaHrsComp Compares the hours value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches and if the day,month and Year value too match then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
Enable days comparison RTC001_erwEnaDaysComp Compares the days value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches and if the month and Year value too match then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
Enable months comparison RTC001_erwEnaMonthsComp Compares the months value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches and if the Year value too match then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
Enable years comparison RTC001_erwEnaYearsComp Compares the years value entered in alarm register with the current clock value and if this matches then an alarm interrupt is generated if enabled.
User defined interrupt handler for Alarm interrupts RTC001_srwAlarmUserFunction The user defined alarm handler function. The function should be defined by the user with the following prototype : void Func(uint32_t CbArg).
This callback function will be called when the Alarm Event occurs.
User configured alarm date value RTC001_srwAlarmDate The alarm date can be configured by the user through this field. The value should be configured as mm/dd/yyyy.
User configured alarm time value RTC001_srwAlarmTime The user configured alarm time value can be entered through this field. The value should be configured as hh:mm:ss


Note : Above UI parameters are used for RTC001 table generation.
